fields.name: Rapid Return
fields.purpose: For less than 1 month away from cycling
fields.description: The Pillar Rapid Return to Cycling Package is designed to help cyclists return to full cycling training following a short term injury or illness.

fields.name: Moderate Return
fields.description: The Pillar Moderate Return to Cycling Package is designed to help cyclists return to full cycling training following a medium term injury or illness.

fields.name: Cautious Return
fields.purpose: For more than 2 months away from cycling
fields.description: The Pillar Cautious Return to Cycling Package is designed to help cyclists return to full cycling training following a long term injury or illness.

fields.name: Short Climbs
fields.purpose: For climbs less than 3 minutes in duration
fields.description: The Pillar Short Climb Hill Climb pack is designed and tailored to specifically improve performance on short punchy anaerobic climbs.

fields.name: Medium Climbs
fields.description: The Pillar Medium Climb Hill Climb pack is designed and tailored to specifically improve performance on medium duration climbs. Most suitable for UK climbs.

fields.name: Long Climbs
fields.purpose: For climbs greater than 8 minutes in duration.
fields.description: The Pillar Long Climb Hill Climb pack is designed and tailored to specifically improve performance on long aerobic climbs.
